title: Introducing: Rosie Lowe
content:
The UK brings us Right Thing, the promising debut EP from Rosie Lowe.

Lowe teams up with producer Dave Omuku (The Invisible, Jessie Ware) to create a sweet spot of understated and bold textural, electronic R&B interplay reminiscent of James Blake.

It is as intricate as it is thoughtful with a feathery vocal restrain similar to Little Dragon, cradled by a delicately progressive soundscape.

Meditate in the lyrical repetition of the inner musings of Lowe’s stream of conscious. Stream her new EP, Right Thing, below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d39
